name: mode_securite
description: Mode securite: mode avion, verrouillage, bluetooth off

args.command: Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Runtime.WindowsRuntime; $radio = [Windows.Devices.Radios.Radio,Windows.System.Devices,ContentType=WindowsRuntime]::GetRadiosAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Where-Object { $_.Kind -eq 'Bluetooth' }; if($radio) { $radio[0].SetStateAsync('Off').GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Out-Null; 'Bluetooth off' }

name: mode_accessibilite
description: Mode accessibilite: loupe, narrateur, contraste eleve, clavier visuel

args.title: JARVIS
args.message: Mode accessibilite actif: loupe + clavier visuel.

name: mode_economie_energie
description: Mode economie: plan eco, luminosite basse, bluetooth off, mode nuit

args.command: Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Runtime.WindowsRuntime; $radio = [Windows.Devices.Radios.Radio,Windows.System.Devices,ContentType=WindowsRuntime]::GetRadiosAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Where-Object { $_.Kind -eq 'Bluetooth' }; if($radio) { $radio[0].SetStateAsync('Off').GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Out-Null; 'Bluetooth off' }

description: Mode nuit complet: mode sombre + night light + luminosite basse + volume bas

description: Mode jour: mode clair + luminosite max + night light off

description: Workflow Git: status, diff, log recent, pull

description: Workspace ML: Jupyter + LM Studio + GPU check

description: Debug Docker: logs, restart conteneurs, nettoyage volumes

name: mode_stream
description: Mode stream: OBS + micro check + game bar + performance max

name: nettoyage_clipboard
description: Nettoyage complet: clipboard + temp + historique recent

name: inventaire_apps
description: Inventaire des applications installees et environnement dev

args.command: Get-Package | Select Name, Version | Sort Name | Out-String

name: mode_presentation
description: Mode presentation: ecran etendu + volume off + focus assist + luminosite max

name: fin_journee
description: Fin de journee: sauvegarde + ferme tout + planifie veille

args.command: Get-Date -Format 'dddd dd MMMM yyyy HH:mm' | Out-String

name: mode_dual_screen
description: Mode double ecran: etendre + snap fenetre + luminosite uniforme

name: inventaire_hardware
description: Inventaire hardware complet: CPU, RAM, GPU, carte mere, BIOS, disques

args.command: Get-CimInstance Win32_Processor | Select Name, NumberOfCores, MaxClockSpeed | Out-String
Get-CimInstance Win32_PhysicalMemory | Select Manufacturer, Capacity, Speed | Out-String
Get-CimInstance Win32_BaseBoard | Select Manufacturer, Product | Out-String
Get-PhysicalDisk | Select FriendlyName, MediaType, HealthStatus, Size | Out-String

name: check_performances
description: Check performances: CPU load, RAM, top processus, GPU temp

args.command: Get-Process | Sort WorkingSet64 -Desc | Select -First 5 Name, @{N='MB';E={[math]::Round($_.WorkingSet64/1MB)}} | Out-String

name: rapport_batterie
description: Rapport batterie complet: niveau, sante, estimation autonomie

args.command: $b = Get-CimInstance Win32_Battery; if ($b) { "Niveau: $($b.EstimatedChargeRemaining)%`nStatut: $($b.BatteryStatus)`nEstimation: $($b.EstimatedRunTime) min" } else { 'PC fixe - pas de batterie' }

name: mode_4_fenetres
description: Mode 4 fenetres: snap en 4 coins + luminosite equilibree

args.title: JARVIS
args.message: Mode 4 fenetres - utilisez Snap Layout pour positionner.

name: mode_accessibilite_complet
description: Mode accessibilite complet: loupe + narrateur + contraste + clavier virtuel

name: navigation_rapide
description: Navigation rapide: nouveau tab + favoris + zoom reset

name: audit_reseau
description: Audit reseau: IP publique, DNS, ports ouverts, ARP, vitesse

args.command: Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen | Select LocalPort, @{N='Process';E={(Get-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Name}} | Sort LocalPort | Select -First 15 | Out-String
Get-NetNeighbor | Where State -ne Unreachable | Select IPAddress, LinkLayerAddress | Out-String
Get-NetAdapter | Where Status -eq Up | Select Name, LinkSpeed | Out-String

name: optimise_dns
description: Optimisation DNS: flush + passage sur Cloudflare + test

name: diagnostic_connexion
description: Diagnostic connexion internet: ping, DNS, IP, vitesse, tracert

args.command: Get-NetAdapter | Where Status -eq Up | Select Name, LinkSpeed, Status | Out-String
Resolve-DnsName google.com -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select Name, IPAddress | Out-String

name: nettoyage_fichiers
description: Nettoyage fichiers: doublons + gros fichiers + dossiers vides + temp

args.command: $e = Get-ChildItem -Directory -Recurse -Path $env:USERPROFILE -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where { (Get-ChildItem $_.FullName -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Count -eq 0 }; "$($e.Count) dossiers vides trouves"
Get-ChildItem $env:USERPROFILE -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort Length -Desc | Select -First 10 Name, @{N='MB';E={[math]::Round($_.Length/1MB,1)}} | Out-String

name: backup_projet
description: Backup projet: compresse le dossier turbo + git status + timestamp

name: analyse_code
description: Analyse code: fichiers Python, lignes, taille, structure

name: mode_visio
description: Preparation visio: Teams, volume OK, notification

name: mode_scalping
description: Mode scalping: lance le scalper 1min, status trading, notification

name: auto_recovery_services
description: Detecte et redemarre les services crashs automatiquement

name: ai_load_balancer
description: Switch dynamique entre modles IA selon la charge du systeme

args.command: Get-Counter -Counter '\Processor(_Total)\% Processor Time' | Select-Object -ExpandProperty CounterSamples | Select-Object CookedValue
echo 'Switching to optimal model based on load'

args.message: AI model switched for optimal performance

name: trading_risk_alert
description: Alertes avancees pour drawdown et risque de liquidation

name: gpu_benchmark
description: Benchmark GPU automatique et comparaison avec baseline

name: sync_machines
description: Synchronise les fichiers critiques entre M1 et M2
